name: h-include
author: Gustaf Nilsson Kotte <gustaf.nk@gmail.com>
description: Declarative client-side inclusion for the web using Custom Elements

scripts.copy: copyfiles h-include.js static/; copyfiles h-include.js lib/
scripts.test: npm run copy; cd test; PORT=8080 make test
scripts.local-tests: npm run copy; npm run server > /dev/null 2>&1 & IS_LOCAL=true mocha -t 600000 __tests__/*-test.js
scripts.remote-tests: npm run copy; npm run server > /dev/null 2>&1 & mocha -t 60000 __tests__/*-test.js
scripts.start: npm run copy; npm run server
